title: Hope
creator_credit: Rowena Ashley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Whether in the city or a small town, Rowena Ashley’s son Michael has had to endure racism from a young age. This is a story about achieving against the odds. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
